content.plan:
1. Navigate to https://www.nike.com/in/ and wait for the homepage to fully load. Verify visual signals: ['Nike', 'Search', 'Bag Items', 'Men', 'Women', 'Kids', 'Sale', 'SNKRS'].
2. Close any promotional popup or banner if present. Verify the close button (e.g., '×' or 'X') is clicked.
3. Click the search icon (or focus the search input). Verify the search input field is visible.
4. Type the phrase "black running shoes" into the search field.
5. Submit the search query (e.g., press Enter or click the search button). Verify that the results page shows product listings.
6. Validate that the search results contain at least one product matching "black running shoes" with visual cues ['Running Shoes', '₹', 'Add to Cart', 'MRP'].
7. Click on the first matching black running shoe product.
8. On the product detail page, verify that size options are displayed, including size 10.
9. Check that size 10 is listed as available.
10. Select size 10.
11. Click the "Add to Bag" button. Verify that a success indication appears (e.g., 'Added', 'Success', 'View Bag').
12. Navigate to the cart (bag) page.
13. Verify that the cart displays the selected black running shoe with size 10 and quantity 1, along with bag navigation elements ['Bag Items', 'Checkout', 'Black Running Shoes', 'Size 10'].
14. Assert that the product is correctly added to the cart with the expected size and quantity.
content.next_step: Navigate to https://www.nike.com/in/, wait until the homepage fully loads, then verify that visual elements 'Nike', 'Search', 'Bag Items', 'Men', 'Women', 'Kids', 'Sale', and 'SNKRS' are present. After verification, close any promotional popup or banner by clicking the close button (identified by '×' or 'X'). Confirm the popup is dismissed.
